item.title: By: Carl Tyler
item.dc:creator: Carl Tyler
item.description: <p>Oh come on, I made that comment thinking no one read my blog, bugger.</p>
item.content:encoded: Oh come on, I made that comment thinking no one read my blog, bugger.

item.title: By: Chris Miller
item.dc:creator: Chris Miller
item.description: <p>"I" don't need to raise 3,000, hehehe. Just as a community we do. A great cause for donation for a great cause for laughter. Thanks for the link to the site. it is going quite well, and fast!</p>
item.content:encoded: “I” don’t need to raise 3,000, hehehe. Just as a community we do. A great cause for donation for a great cause for laughter. Thanks for the link to the site. it is going quite well, and fast!
